channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 21:09 ATTENTION !!! Threat response
item.description: 🟢 21:09 ATTENTION !!! Threat response #Pologov_district This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
